definitions.definition: A button whose functions are pausing and resuming something, such as a DVD player, a video game or a computer.
A temporary stop or rest; an intermission of action; interruption; suspension; cessation.
A short time for relaxing and doing something else.
In writing and printing, a mark indicating the place and nature of an arrest of voice in reading; a punctuation mark.
definitions.example: Teach the pupil to mind the pauses.

definitions.definition: A break or paragraph in writing.
A sign indicating continuance of a note or rest.
(as direct object) take pause: hesitate; give pause: cause to hesitate
To take a temporary rest, take a break for a short period after an effort.
To interrupt an activity and wait.
definitions.example: When telling the scary story, he paused for effect.

definitions.definition: To hesitate; to hold back; to delay.
To halt the play or playback of, temporarily, so that it can be resumed from the same point.
definitions.example: to pause a song, a video, or a computer game
